title: Yosemite National Park
description: In November 2009, my school took a class trip to Yosemite.

photos.description: A giant sequoia tree. It's pretty big.
photos.alt: A very tall and wide tree rising up with other behind it.

photos.description: Half Dome. I think "dome" is generous, but it is definitely rounded.
photos.alt: A large rocky mountain in the distance with a curved slope on top.

photos.description: Half Dome again from somewhere else. Notice the many trees.
photos.alt: A large rocky mountain in the distance with a curved slope and many dense trees in the valley below.
A raven sitting on a tree branch with its beak open.

photos.description: A jet trail heading apparently directly into a mountain. Reminds me a bit of an inspirational poster. Lots of space for a quote in the sky.
photos.alt: A jet trail angled down towards a cliff and disappearing behind it.
